segments.text: The summer vacation is coming . Have you any plans ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven't made up my mind . Maybe I will go to the US . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am going on a hiking trip . It's good exercise as well as fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So why not come and join us ? Lee will come as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great . I will go hiking with you .
segments.speaker: S2
